titles.title: We Must Run, Run, Run This Race That's Set Before Us

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We must run, run, run this race that's set before us
We must run, run, run until the race is won.
Let us lay aside each weight and the sin that doth
Beset us and we'll run, run, run until the race is won.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus ran, ran, ran this race that's set before us,
And He won, won, won; He is now at God's right hand.
Together with the cloud of witnesses
He's calling us to run, run, run until the race is won.
